attributes.action: lesley hayter to stand up and take notice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: leave the EU. Britain was the stongest power in the world, now we are wimps!!! Can you imagin our soldiers who fought for our country in WWII, only to have it given away by the likes of "our" government - we have no say and if we do is it taken notice on????

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Your petition also overlaps with an existing open petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/UK-leave-EU/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
